sentences.sContent: Copy this page in your notebook.
sentences.sCn: 把这一页抄到你的笔记本上。

sentences.sContent: She rummaged in the desk drawers for her notebook.
sentences.sContent_eng: She rummaged in the desk drawers for her notebook.
sentences.sCn: 她在书桌抽屉里翻找她的笔记本。

sentences.sContent: She immediately copied the letter in her notebook.
sentences.sContent_eng: She immediately copied the letter in her notebook.
sentences.sCn: 她立即把这封信抄在她的笔记本里。

phrases.pCn: 笔记本电脑；笔记本型个人计算机

remMethod.val: note(笔记) ＋ book(书， 本) → 笔记本

trans.tranOther: a book made of plain paper on which you can write notes
